results.name: Sum of deficiencies of deficient divisors of n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
mathematica: f[n_] := 2 n - DivisorSigma[1, n]; Array[DivisorSum[#, f, f@ # >= 0 &] &, 92] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Sep 04 2018 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 04 2018
